characters: Multiple pedestrians, a blue and orange car, a motorcycle
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through an urban area with multiple pedestrians walking on both sides of the road. A blue and orange car is seen moving from the left side to the right side of the frame. A motorcycle appears on the right side of the frame towards the end.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a slow and steady speed to navigate through the urban area with pedestrians. The vehicle is cautious due to the presence of pedestrians and other vehicles, ensuring safety by not accelerating.
key_objects: 1) Left side: Multiple pedestrians, approximately 5 meters away, walking towards the center of the road. 2) Front: A blue and orange car, approximately 10 meters away, moving from left to right. 3) Right side: A motorcycle, approximately 3 meters away, moving towards the center of the road.
